channel.title: Any good runescape bots for linux?
channel.description:
Are there any good bots for linux? I'd like to make a new account and bot on it but I wasn't sure if I could find a bot since I run linux.
Download links would be great.

item.title: Any good runescape bots for linux?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“the bank, post:17, topic:332555”][quote author=Cowie` link=topic=428984.msg3150458#msg3150458 date=1268497426]

[quote author=the bank link=topic=428984.msg3150367#msg3150367 date=1268491603]

As far as I know there aren’t any bots that do not run on linux.
[/quote]SCAR

Runs under wine, denied.
[/quote]Since when?[/quote]
Last time I checked (granted, it’s been YEARS) it will run under wine, but won’t execute any scripts that move the mouse or provide keyboard input, so it doesn’t really work as a bot or macroing tool.

Read full topic
item.source: Any good runescape bots for linux?

item.title: Any good runescape bots for linux?
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“Not X A Alex, post:19, topic:332555”][quote author=Tekk123 link=topic=428984.msg3152310#msg3152310 date=1268671942]
Quirlion, my bot.

http://quirlion.com/

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


[/quote]
Does it have any combat scripts that support food eating?

I’m using kbot right now and its working fine. But some of the scripts don’t support eating so I’m left fighting chickens.[/quote]Why don’t you try writing your own script for whatever bot you use?

Read full topic

item.title: Any good runescape bots for linux?
item.dc:creator: @g-stringer g-stringer
item.description:
@g-stringer wrote:

Not X A Alex:

Do any of you know were to get any of these bots for linux? I keep looking but can’t find anything.

www.rscheata.net, but it has turned invite only so your best bet is going to www.rsbots.net and buying one of the locked clients there.

www.kbot.info, www.srl-forums.com, www.robotzindisguise.com etc. etc.

If I’m not allowed to name any of these sites, tell me and I will remove this post.

EDIT: If you do want to get onto www.rscheata.net, PM me and I will give you an invite.

Read full topic
item.source: Any good runescape bots for linux?

@system wrote:

g-stringer:

I understand there is some grudge going around against mark and eric but you can’t deny the fact that iBot is in fact a good bot.

UberClickOptions.BREAK_IF_GAME_SCREEN_LEFT_CLICK_ABSOLUTE_MISS

item.title: Any good runescape bots for linux?
item.dc:creator: @g-stringer g-stringer
item.description:
@g-stringer wrote:

[quote=“Tenen, post:6, topic:332555”][quote author=g-stringer link=topic=428984.msg3150336#msg3150336 date=1268490375]
iBot
[/quote]
b&[/quote]

I understand there is some grudge going around against mark and eric but you can’t deny the fact that iBot is in fact a good bot.

To the OP, the only bot I am not sure about if it will run on linux or not is the RID platform, but it will probably work.

Read full topic
